subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Football
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: An hour before the draft was scheduled to begin, the Lions announced that Matthew Stafford had signed a six-year contract worth $41.7 million in guarantees and as much as $78 million.
snippet: An hour before the draft was scheduled to begin, the Lions announced that Matthew Stafford had signed a six-year contract worth $41.7 million in guarantees and as much as $78 million.
